name: ⋆ NEW Galactic Spotify Web ⋆
description:
Spotify Web Player (SWP) got a new update, and their domain moved to open.spotify.com.

Thus, I have taken my old Galactic Style and converted it into the new player! Enjoy!

This style does the following:
-Shrinks the annoying HUGE album covers
-Changes background to dark galaxy
-Changes certain colors to a pink/blue combo
-Volume and controls are pink colored
-My own original galaxy logo in replace of the boring Spotify white logo



// Please do not reuse this code in any style.

user.name: Messier
user.about:
If you have any problems with any of my styles, please send me the problem and I will do my best to fix it. 
You can request styles either at my spam email or through Howrse.
Howrse username: j7t85jf84 hfgb3

additional_info:
Change Log

7/31/18 - Sorry for the wait, logo is now working. Changed the background to new galaxy.

9/10/17 - Changed the background image and a few of the side bar colors.

7/23/17 - Added some padding around the logo so it would not be cut off. Currently working on changing the colors of the "currently playing song" and the device bar at the bottom.

4/18/17 - Released. Please report any bugs or fixes needed to mixedupbreed@gmail.com
